data.oai_dc:dc: This competition assay dataset contains the number of plasmid-containing and plasmid-free cells sampled every 10 generations (24 h) over a 48 generation period for mixed populations consisting of plasmid-containing (ancestral host and plasmid or evolved host and plasmid) and their respective plasmid-free segregants (ancestral host or evolved host only, respectively).
Multidrug resistance|Pseudomonas|horizontal gene transfer|experimental evolution|adaptation|plasmid persistence|IncP-1 plasmid
